name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot with an orange box body, equipped with retro console buttons and foundry arms and legs. Its screen displays a captivating combination of red and black colors, reminiscent of classic oscilloscope displays. To complete its unique look, Retrotron also wears a stylish helmet as an addon. Retrotron is a proud member of the WebtrES club.
